Experienced Android Developer specializing in educational and research applications. Passionate about creating tools that help in learning and understanding mobile systems. This application is developed purely for educational research purposes to understand mobile monitoring mechanisms and security protocols.
Education: B.Sc in Computer Science & Engineering Specialization: Mobile Application Security Research Focus: Ethical Monitoring & Privacy Protection

⚠ FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY
This application is designed for: • Educational research and study • Parental monitoring with consent • Device security testing
IMPORTANT: 1. Must have explicit consent from device owner 2. Illegal to monitor without permission 3. Respect privacy laws and regulations 4. Use responsibly and ethically
Developer: Ahamed Rahim Website: https://ahamed-rahim.pages.dev/ Purpose: Educational Research
• SMS Forwarding: All incoming SMS will be forwarded
• Notification Monitoring: App notifications will be tracked
• Gallery Access: Photos and videos can be accessed
• Telegram Integration: Data sent to configured bot

You must have explicit consent from the device owner before using this application.
By clicking OK, you confirm: 1. You have permission to monitor this device 2. You understand the legal implications 3. This is for educational purposes only 4. You will use this application ethically

This application is developed solely for educational and research purposes to study: • Mobile monitoring mechanisms • Data security protocols • Privacy protection methods • Ethical usage guidelines
Not intended for commercial use or unauthorized monitoring.
